about_p1: As an undergraduate in Games and Multimedia at Polytechnic of Leiria, I am passionate about creating engaging and interactive web applications and games.
about_p2: I have completed a professional higher education course in Web Development and Multimedia, where I learned how to use various tools and technologies, such as Bootstrapping, Weebly, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
about_p3: I have also developed some projects that showcase my skills and creativity in web and videogame development. I am eager to apply my knowledge and competencies in real-world settings, and to collaborate with other professionals and experts in the field. I am currently very interested in AI programming in videogames.
about_p4: I am always willing to learn new things and to challenge myself. My goal is to become a proficient and versatile game developer and multimedia specialist, who can contribute to the innovation and excellence of the industry.
